perturbation.original_text: (c) "MS Licensed Materials" means collectively, to the extent owned by a member of the MS Provider Group, any hardware settings and configurations, generic software libraries and routines, and generic document templates not separately commercialized by the MS Provider Group (as defined below) and used by MSCI prior to the Trigger Date. For the avoidance of doubt, the MS Licensed Materials does not include (i) any patent, trademark or service mark of the MS Provider Group, or (ii) any infrastructure hardware or software (e.g., monitoring software and systems, customized operating systems (and components such as AFS, DNS, AD, etc.), and middleware). For the avoidance of doubt, the document templates do not include any references to members of the MS Provider Group or its personnel.
perturbation.changed_text: (c) "MS Licensed Materials" means collectively, to the extent owned by a member of the MS Provider Group, any hardware settings and configurations, generic software libraries and routines, and generic document templates not separately commercialized by the MS Provider Group (as defined below) and used by MSCI prior to the Trigger Date. For the avoidance of doubt, the MS Licensed Materials may include (i) any patent, trademark or service mark of the MS Provider Group, or (ii) any infrastructure hardware or software (e.g., monitoring software and systems, customized operating systems (and components such as AFS, DNS, AD, etc.), and middleware). For the avoidance of doubt, the document templates do not include any references to members of the MS Provider Group or its personnel.
perturbation.explanation: The original definition explicitly excludes patents, trademarks, service marks and infrastructure hardware/software from MS Licensed Materials. The modification changes 'does not include' to 'may include,' creating a direct contradiction and uncertainty about the scope of the license.

perturbation.original_text: MSCI hereby grants (subject to any existing third party contractual obligations) to MS a non-exclusive, perpetual, irrevocable, world- wide, royalty-free license for MS to use, modify, copy, create derivative works of and sublicense, for any business purpose, the MSCI Licensed Materials.
perturbation.changed_text: MSCI hereby grants (subject to any existing third party contractual obligations) to MS a non-exclusive, time-limited, revocable, world- wide, royalty-bearing license for MS to use, modify, copy, create derivative works of and sublicense, for any business purpose, the MSCI Licensed Materials. This license is valid for a period of 5 years from the effective date.
perturbation.explanation: The original grant is perpetual, irrevocable, and royalty-free. The modified version is time-limited (5 years), revocable, and royalty-bearing, creating a direct contradiction regarding the nature and duration of the license granted.

perturbation.original_text: THE LICENSE GRANTS HEREUNDER ARE PROVIDED "AS-IS" WITH NO WARRANTIES, AND THE PARTIES EXPRESSLY EXCLUDE AND DISCLAIM ANY WARRANTIES UNDER OR ARISING AS A RESULT OF THIS AGREEMENT, WHETHER EXPRESS, IMPLIED OR STATUTORY, INCLUDING, WITHOUT LIMITATION, THE IMPLIED WARRANTIES OF MERCHANTABILITY, FITNESS FOR A PARTICULAR PURPOSE, TITLE, NON-INFRINGEMENT OR ANY OTHER WARRANTY WHATSOEVER.
perturbation.changed_text: THE LICENSE GRANTS HEREUNDER ARE PROVIDED "AS-IS" WITH NO WARRANTIES, EXCEPT THAT MSCI warrants that it has the right to grant the licenses it purports to grant hereunder and that the MSCI Licensed Materials will perform substantially in accordance with its pre-existing documentation. The Parties expressly exclude and disclaim all other warranties under or arising as a result of this agreement, whether express, implied or statutory, including, without limitation, the implied warranties of MERCHANTABILITY, FITNESS FOR A PARTICULAR PURPOSE, TITLE, NON-INFRINGEMENT OR ANY OTHER WARRANTY WHATSOEVER.
perturbation.explanation: The original section disclaims all warranties. The modified version introduces an express warranty that MSCI has the right to grant the licenses and that the MSCI Licensed Materials will perform substantially in accordance with its pre-existing documentation. This contradicts the initial complete disclaimer, creating uncertainty about the extent of warranties provided.
